"Quick Food":
"You can use the fruit and vegetables obtained from Gathering to create Quick Food, which temporarily enhances your abilities.

Quick Food can be created at the Food Stand or at any Ryuker Device."

"If you make Quick Food using ingredients from the Region that you are currently in, you will receive a \"Region Matching Bonus\".

If you want to see which Regions an item can be found in, look at its Item Details."
